description: Reserved matters application seeking approval of landscaping, appearance, scale, access and layout pursuant for Phases 4A, 4B and 5 of the Dollis Valley Regeneration pursuant to Condition 7 of the hybrid planning permission reference B/00354/13 dated 01/10/2013 involving the erection of 223 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) comprising 105 houses and 118 apartments, including associated infrastructure, car parking and landscaping together with details to discharge the requirements of condition 89 in respect of Phases 4A, 4B and 5
